Activity

We create, manage, and maintain a wide assortment of projects. Use this page to stay up to date on what we are currently doing.

In Development

Center for Aquatic Biology and Aquaculture

CABA has been on one of our oldest plone servers. The server (.48) is unstable and needs it’s sites moved off of it.

  • Contact: Erik Hallen
  • Average Monthly Views: 449

  • Development URL: http://dev.caba.ucdavis.edu/
  • Github Repo: https://github.com/ucdavis/caba

  • Design Start: 01/23/2016
  • Development Start: 03/01/2016

  • Projected Launch: Spring 2016

Grow Food at UC Davis

After we moved ASI off (.28) only one site remained, Saladbowl Garden. After contacting the owners about retiring the site, they denied and requested a new simple site that hosts a number of the edible gardens at UC Davis
